description: Add event tracking event name and value
name: track_event_add

actid.description: Your unique tracking account ID (can be found on the Integrations page)

event.description: The event name you want to add. Example: 'my_custom_event'

eventdata.description: The event value (related to the event name). Example: '12345'. (Note: if you don't include this parameter it will still save the event name.)

key.description: Your unique tracking event key (can be found on the Integrations page)

visit.description: See below example for the data you can include here.
